Name: spastic diplegia
Definition: A spastic cerebral palsy that affects lower extremities resulting in tight leg and hip muscles. The legs cross at the knees

Name: spastic hemiplegia
Definition: A spastic cerebral palsy that affects one side of the body resulting in stiff arm

Name: spastic monoplegia
Definition: A spastic cerebral palsy that affects only one limb.

Name: spastic quadriplegia
Definition: A spastic cerebral palsy that affects all four limbs. The individuals have difficulty with walking and talking.
